live_updates: Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours. Thank you for your patience! We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
41597.summary: Some customers in the Ootischenia area of Castlegar are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
41597.title: Sept 9 - Castlegar (Ootischenia) | Service interruption (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: The issues have been resolved and all services should be up and running. Thank you for your patience.
